experience.title: Founder
experience.description: Cross Skills is a skill-building & services platform for individuals and corporates.• Expansion of Cross Skills to 15+ cities; added network of 125+ interns from various colleges• Established a corporate vertical to start B2B Dealing for skill-building workshops• Automated the operations & workflow, managed the team of interns, reduced cost and increased profitsCross Skills is a passion-driven venture with a mission to create a sustainable and profitable network of people equipped with various professional skills and are looking to build a sustainable career around these skills and their passion. positions.subtitle: Toastmasters International
positions.description: The fourth ranking club officer, the Vice President of Public Relations (VPPR) is responsible for managing communication between the Club and its Community - both externally and internally - to communicate successes, explain challenges, and announce changes to maintain a positive image for the club; and to attract new members.• Promote the club to local media: newspapers, radio stations, television stations;• Produce and distribute a club newsletter at least monthly, oversee editor of club newsletter;• Maintain the club webpage, oversee club webmaster;• Promote membership drives and other programs.• Attend district-sponsored club officer training;
positions.title: Vice President Public Relations

The fourth ranking club officer, the Vice President of Public Relations (VPPR) is responsible for managing communication between the Club and its Community - both externally and internally - to communicate successes, explain challenges, and announce changes to maintain a positive image for the club; and to attract new members.

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: • Selection for this Internship was through IIT Delhi's eDC (Entrepreneurship Development Cell) Business and Entrepreneurship Conclave, BECON 2018.• We were shortlisted from 3500+ participants based on resumes.• This program focused on understanding the functioning of the organization closely and interacting with employees to get our doubts clear.• This was followed by a Case Study about the Company where we used our Analytics and Decision Making Skills to present the answer to questions asked under the case study.• We got exclusive chance to interact with Ambrish Gupta (CEO, Knowlarity) and Ajay Shrivastava (CPO & CTO, Knowlarity) and asked their point of views about the strategies they follow in the organisation.• Interacted with HR and different members of Tech Team to know more about their work in product development and areas they specifically focus upon.• Apart from our academics in college, this opportunity made us know the practical aspects of a corporate organisation and real-world problem they face with or without any mistake committed by any of their members or in short unexpected circumstances.
experience.description_html: • Selection for this Internship was through IIT Delhi's eDC (Entrepreneurship Development Cell) Business and Entrepreneurship Conclave, BECON 2018.• We were shortlisted from 3500+ participants based on resumes.• This program focused on understanding the functioning of the organization closely and interacting with employees to get our doubts clear.• This was followed by a Case Study about the Company where we used our Analytics and Decision Making Skills to present the answer to questions asked under the case study.• We got exclusive chance to interact with Ambrish Gupta (CEO, Knowlarity) and Ajay Shrivastava (CPO & CTO, Knowlarity) and asked their point of views about the strategies they follow in the organisation.• Interacted with HR and different members of Tech Team to know more about their work in product development and areas they specifically focus upon.• Apart from our academics in college, this opportunity made us know the practical aspects of a corporate organisation and real-world problem they face with or without any mistake committed by any of their members or in short unexpected circumstances.

volunteer_experience.info: Toastmasters International is a non-profit educational organization that teaches public speaking and leadership skills through a worldwide network of clubs. Headquartered in Englewood, Colo., the organization's membership exceeds 357,000 in more than 16,600 clubs in 143 countries. Since 1924, Toastmasters International has helped people from diverse backgrounds become more confident speakers, communicators, and leaders.

volunteer_experience.info:
In the spirit of ideas worth spreading, TEDx is a program of local, self-organized events that bring people together to share a TED-like experience. At a TEDx event, TEDTalks video and live speakers combine to spark deep discussion and connection in a small group. These local, self-organized events are branded TEDx, where x = independently organized TED event. The TED Conference provides general guidance for the TEDx program, but individual TEDx events are self-organized (subject to certain…

          In the spirit of ideas worth spreading, TEDx is a program of local, self-organized events that bring people together to share a TED-like experience. At a TEDx event, TEDTalks video and live speakers combine to spark deep discussion and connection in a small group. These local, self-organized events are branded TEDx, where x = independently organized TED event. The TED Conference provides general guidance for the TEDx program, but individual TEDx events are self-organized (subject to certain rules and regulations).

volunteer_experience.info:
Entrepreneurship Summit is the brainchild of E-Cell, NSIT. Aiming at inculcation and development the very spirit of entrepreneurship, eCell NSUT comes up with its annual affair to stir an essence of teamwork and synergy in the masses. We believe that, for the students to develop in an all-around manner, it becomes absolutely imperative to concoct them for the competitive corporate world.About ECell NSIT:E-Cell NSIT or the Entrepreneurship Cell of Netaji Subhas Institute of…
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          Entrepreneurship Summit is the brainchild of E-Cell, NSIT. Aiming at inculcation and development the very spirit of entrepreneurship, eCell NSUT comes up with its annual affair to stir an essence of teamwork and synergy in the masses. We believe that, for the students to develop in an all-around manner, it becomes absolutely imperative to concoct them for the competitive corporate world.About ECell NSIT:E-Cell NSIT or the Entrepreneurship Cell of Netaji Subhas Institute of Technology is a distinguished student-run body which is responsible for promoting an entrepreneurial mindset among the students. Essentially a closed society, recruitment to the society takes place in two steps: A Group discussion followed by a personal interview round. E-Cell NSIT conducts various SIGs( Student Interest Groups) on the topics of general management that every budding student entrepreneur should be aware of. In addition to that, we conduct Delhi Entrepreneurship Challenge, to promote entrepreneurship within the colleges of North India and our very own Entrepreneurship Summit as well.
            

    
    

    
        Show less
volunteer_experience.subtitle: eCell NSIT (The Entrepreneurship Cell of NSIT)
volunteer_experience.title: Volunteer, Graphic Designing

volunteer_experience.info:
CONSILIUM’18:Consilium’18 was the 4th edition of the Annual Business Conclave of NSIT, organised by the Finance and Economics Society (FES) and promised to be one of the biggest and most competitive Business Conclaves in the Delhi circuit attracting participation from renowned colleges like SRCC, IITs, IIMs, etc. TRADEVERSE: Not the usual mockstock! We quadrupled the excitement as the teams traded in 4 different markets with 4 different currencies and 1 common cryptocurrency…
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          CONSILIUM’18:Consilium’18 was the 4th edition of the Annual Business Conclave of NSIT, organised by the Finance and Economics Society (FES) and promised to be one of the biggest and most competitive Business Conclaves in the Delhi circuit attracting participation from renowned colleges like SRCC, IITs, IIMs, etc. TRADEVERSE: Not the usual mockstock! We quadrupled the excitement as the teams traded in 4 different markets with 4 different currencies and 1 common cryptocurrency. It provided the simulation of the stock market where we have to trade through brokers keeping in mind the figures being generated through news in the entire event.
            

    
    

    
        Show less
